heroSection1.title: Discover the history of your current or future vehicle.
heroSection1.subtitle: Request a detailed report to avoid bad deals, sell faster, or ensure your vehicle is safe and reliable.

form.noVin: I do not have a VIN

validation.vinInvalid: Invalid VIN. Must be 17 characters, no I/O/Q.

heroBanner1.trusted: Over 9,000,000 people from over 35 countries have trusted us.

heroBanner2.title: What do we check for in the report?
heroBanner2.subtitle: VinSpec is the largest online database for used vehicles, containing over one billion data entries from around the world.

content.images: We search auctions, classifieds, and insurer records for historic photos of the vehicle.
content.damages: See reported accidents, repairs, and damage estimates to avoid hidden issues.
content.odometer: Mileage readings over time to detect rollbacks or inconsistencies.
content.specifications: Factory specs, options, and installed equipment decoded from the VIN.
content.marketValue: Current market estimates based on model, mileage, and condition.
content.safety: Safety test results and recall status from official sources.
content.disaster: Floods, fires, and other natural-disaster indicators tied to the vehicle’s history.

heroBanner3.title: Choose wisely
heroBanner3.subtitle: Make sure that your new vehicle is a reliable companion

avoid.title: Avoid expensive mistakes
avoid.desc: Learn every vehicle's history so you don't throw your money to the wind.

time.title: Save valuable time
time.desc: Test drives take hours, so narrow down your choices in advance.

deal.title: Make a better deal
deal.desc: Once you've chosen your next vehicle, we have the facts to help you lower its price.

customerReviews.title: Check our customer reviews
customerReviews.subtitle: Find out why they use VinSpec to make better deals when buying a car

1.message: It is very calming knowing that you have all of the information available on the car you are buying beforehand. The website offers a very thorough check. Appreciate you guys!

2.message: Overall the app is great. It is a bit expensive, but it's worth it! Better to pay a little more than throw thousands of euros at a car you know nothing about. They helped me avoid a car with a rolled back odometer—kudos!

3.message: Here is my experience with VinSpec. I went to check a car yesterday listed at 63,000 km. I liked it and was about to buy it, but my wife made me get a report first and voilà—the real mileage was 457,000.

worldMapBanner.title: Leaders in the field of automotive data
worldMapBanner.p1: Since our founding in 2025, we have expanded to 35 markets and continue to grow. The listed countries show where you can access VinSpec reports.
worldMapBanner.p2: Our vehicle history reports are based on data from over 900 international databases, including national vehicle registries, insurance companies, legal agencies, and other institutions.

expandBanner.title: Expand your automobile business
expandBanner.subtitle: Our products will increase the effectiveness and transparency of your automobile business

bullets.risk: Reduce the risk of unexpected expenses
